channel.title: Moparscape coding
channel.description:
I am new and i was wondering if someone could answer these questions please... 1.How would you add an object for PhoneScape?
2.How do you spawn npcs?
3.How do you make npcs that sell stuff?
4. How do I make commands like ::armor and you get armor? (what file do i open)
5. How do i make a menu like if you type ::help It would show a screen with help in it?( I know I am going to pick what is going to be in it...)
6. How do I make places the wild and make places non-wild?

item.title: Moparscape coding
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

  1. makeglobalobject()
  2. autospawn.cfg
  3. shops.cfg & client.java
  4. customcommand(…) {
  5. look at mainhelpmenu()
  6. nonwild()

Read full topic
